system.description:
You are almost like unto an avenging angel, and your enemies would do well to fear you accordingly. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • When you damage a creature of the types selected for your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.01szspr1nunp0lql]{Divine Sense} with a cleric cantrip, you can spend a use of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.c6aiq8cd90fo3ry1]{Divine Smite} and add the Divine Smite damage to the cantrip’s damage.
  • You gain an expertise die on concentration checks to maintain cleric and herald spells.
  • When you roll a 1 on a die when dealing radiant damage, you can reroll the die. You must use the new result.
  • When you cast a spell that heals one of more creatures, as part of the action of casting the spell, you can spend points from your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.my42mip0qc35rcp2]{Lay on Hands} pool up to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1) and heal that many additional hit points to a creature affected by the spell.
